## PE Buyers Identified

### 1. Hadley Capital ⭐ HIGH PRIORITY
| Attribute | Details |
|-----------|---------|
| **Type** | Private Equity Firm |
| **Location** | Chicago, IL |
| **Finder Fee History** | ✅ **VERIFIED** - Standard Lehman Fee structure |
| **Fee Structure** | 5% of 1st $1M, 4% of 2nd $1M, 3% of 3rd $1M, 2% of 4th $1M, 1% remainder |
| **Check Size** | $1M - $15M (lower middle market) |
| **Target Industries** | Manufacturing, distribution, specialty services, business services |
| **Focus Match** | Blue-collar services, small company acquisitions |
| **Contact** | https://www.hadleycapital.com/about-us/contact-us/ |

**Evidence:**
- Explicitly works with finders and non-traditional finders (recruiters, consultants)
- Standard finder fee agreement available for download
- 20+ years of paying finder fees to intermediaries
- Transparent about fee structure (Lehman Formula)

**Score: 92/100**
- Finder fee history: 40/40 (verified, standard program)
- Buyer type: 20/25 (established PE firm)
- Focus match: 17/20 (manufacturing, specialty services)
- Industry coverage: 15/15 (broad small business coverage)
